nidahas mathadharinta anuwa jakh yanu ros naukawe yana atharathura age sithuwili matha mawunu ek mithya charithayak ho kalpa mathrayak bawayi.meyata hethuwa aya naukawedi gaman kala kalayedi aya muhuna dun asahanakari manasika pidanaya walakaganimata age sithuwili athara nimawuna charithaya jak bawayi.jak yanu age galawum karuwa bawa age sithuwili walin nimawa aththe aya wisinma thama sathu nopenena aathma shakthiya ha musu karagena bawayi pawasenne..eya owun dedenage prathama hamuwima thula age siyadiwi nasalima jak wisin nawatha lima thulama eeki age abhyanthara shakthiya pilimbaimbau wana bawa mowun wadi duratath pawasanawa.tayitanik hi sathya siduwimeda jak wanneku gana kisindu sandahanak nomathi wimath thawa karunak..awurudu 101 k wayasa ros da mehi yam thanaka ewanneku sitiyada?

pasugiyada barlin nuwara pawathwunu 17 wani loka guwan marga sanwardhana samuluwedi thama athulu shri lankawen sahabhagi wu niyojitha pirisa mema illima sidukala bawada amathyawaraya sandahan kaleya.mehidi shri lankawe dewana jathyanthara guwanthotupala wana maththala guwanthotupala bhawitha kirima sambandhayen adala guwan samagamwala dadi awadhanaya yomu wu bawa kiyu amathyawaraya loka guwan marga sanwardhana samuluwata sambandha aayathanawalin eeta yahapath prathichara palawima wadath wadagath bawada kiya sitiyeya.maththala guwanthotupala idiwimen pasu meratata paminena sancharakayinge sankhyawada wishala lesa ihala yanu athayi da hethema wadiduratath kiya..
